explains: n. 花言巧语，浮夸之词；修辞，修辞学

sentences.en: Attempting to resolve this contradiction, Harris concludes that Fern employed flowery rhetoric strategically to disguise her subversive goals beneath apparent conventionality.
sentences.cn: 为了解决这一矛盾，哈里斯得出结论，弗恩战略性地使用华丽的修辞，在显见的常规之下掩盖她的颠覆目的。

sentences.en: The chapter is mostly wordy rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 这一章多半是冗长的华丽词藻。

sentences.en: This is the beginning of Congress-bashing presidential campaign rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 抨击国会是充满花言巧语的总统竞选的开始。
